messages.message: cc: @Jonathan Shih @lydia @Erick @arun @Felicia on some Refiner features that people might ask about: https://stackoverflow.com/c/instabase/questions/47/52#52. Asked Jonathan to help update the docs on it (cc: @Chetan)
ah cool I didn’t know we could set elements of `_FN_CONTEXT` and have them persist. good to know.
i've had this idea for a long time (before even joining instabase) that we could have a robust KV store that could be scoped to a flow, flow run, global etc to save data like this! maybe one day
If folks know where to find the internal redis wrappers they could do that already =). Do we ship with a database? Would be better if stuff didn't expire
omg that’s amazing. I also didn’t know we could do that. Changes so much :slightly_smiling_face:
